body.p:
Catlettsburg Ky
May 28th 1864
Harison Taylor Esqr.
Speaker of the House of Representatives of Kentucky
Sir
Intending to leave the state in a few days I hereby tender my resignation as the Representative of the counties of Lawrence and Boyd in the Kentucky Legislature

Maysville Ky July 8th, 1864
Mr. Sec. of State

A short time since the above resgination of D. W. Johns, refr. from Boyd & Lawrence was recd by me. I forward it to your office, thinking perhaps that Johns had neglected to apprize the proper Department
of his resignation

I am most respectfully
Your Obt Sevt.
H. Taylor

Resignation of D W Johns
Recd
12th July/64
